name: The Vor Project
description:
An interactive gaming experience with the goal of enlightening and informing players of dangerous phishing tactics and untrustworthy URLs found on the internet!

Help our friend Neri fend off unreliable URLs and Links! As the player, you'll read & evaluate URLs to determine their credibility, then with Neri's help, you'll dispatch of the URLs based off your evaluation! Incorrectly assess the URLs too many times and you'll fail, so read carefully! 

Put your knowledge of phishing and URL trustworthiness to the test!

=========================

* This game is meant primarily for mobile play. May not run on Desktops. *

=========================
